ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
The mockextras library is designed to be used with the
unittest.mock library in python 3 or the mock backport of this
(http://www.voidspace.org.uk/python/mock/) in python 2. The mockextras
library adds a number of features that are found in other mocking
libraries namely:
   * a fluent API for the configuration of stubs
   * stubs
   * matchers

The mockextras library is designed to be used with the
unittest.mock library in python 3 or the mock backport of this
(http://www.voidspace.org.uk/python/mock/) in python 2. The mockextras
library adds a number of features that are found in other mocking
libraries namely:
   * a fluent API for the configuration of stubs
   * stubs
   * matchers

name: mockextras
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mockextras" %}
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 09b77b91a9bffd475eaaeb631628bdfd9a7e3eed31d235290614bb38c7979692

build:
  number: 7
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pytest
    - coveralls
    - pytest-cov
    - coverage

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - mockextras

about:
  home: https://github.com/manahl/mockextras
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Extensions to the mock library
  description: |
    The mockextras library is designed to be used with the
    unittest.mock library in python 3 or the mock backport of this
    (http://www.voidspace.org.uk/python/mock/) in python 2. The mockextras
    library adds a number of features that are found in other mocking
    libraries namely: 
       * a fluent API for the configuration of stubs
       * stubs
       * matchers
  doc_url: http://mockextras.readthedocs.org/
  dev_url: http://github.com/manahl/mockextras

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - trendelkampschroer
